definition: to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create

sentences.english: Better reputation, innovation, excellence, to achieve hundred percent pass rate.
sentences.chinese: 更佳的信譽，創新，創優，實現出廠合格率百分百。

sentences.english: People don’t actually fail, they just quit to easily.
sentences.chinese: 他們並非真的失敗，創優產只是太容易放棄了。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the points of creating excellence in the road and bridge construction project on-site.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要對路橋工程現場施工中創優要點進行探討。
